para.text: dialog box is used to change the position of the cross section through the mesh. It is displayed by selecting

The user can change either the end points of the cross section or specify a new angle for the cross section. Depending on which one the user selects, the user can enter either the new angle or the new end points. When the user clicks the

button, the change is made. When specifying a new angle, the center of rotation is either the center of the visible portion of the cross section line. If the cross section line is not visible on the top view of the model, the center of the cross section line is used as the center of rotation.
